extendedInfo.description: If youâre like us, you are too busy working or fighting crime to truly appreciate the best content that the Internet has to offer.  Of course, by âInternetâ we really only mean âCracked.com.â  Well, thanks to this handy little app, weâve got you covered!The Best of Cracked Vol. 1 app features our top 25 most viewed articles, videos and photoplasties of 2011.  Worried about what to do on your next 6 hour plane ride?  Not sure how to pass the time at your next boring family reunion?  Worry no longer.  This app is chock full of the humor and mind blowing information that Cracked is known for.  All we ask is that you scotch guard your belongings accordingly.

reviews.title: Heck of a lot better than its brother app
reviews.comment: This app\'s articles are classic. They are definitely their best, and the ads are minimal here, unlike the actual cracked app. Couldn\'t love it anymore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No offline mode?
reviews.comment: Would be a lot better if you could just see all of the articles without using data, since they aren\'t bound to update on this app.
reviews.author: Timothy Yu

reviews.title: Battery drains out faster than expected.
reviews.comment: Great fun. But a battery hog. Reading the same stuff on almost any android browser wouldn\'t be so battery intensive.
reviews.author: satadru sengupta

reviews.comment: Love cracked...DL\'ed this and V.2.0 about 7 months ago but neither would move beyond load screen.  Uninstalled both. Decided to try w/ V.1.0 again today but same issue. Such sad news...Cracked is to me what sex scandals are to politicians- I need it!\tSide note- New Android Cracked Lite updates rock my world :)
reviews.author: Kari McDonald

reviews.title: Always good for a laugh
reviews.comment: So the app is good with plenty of laughs. However a major complaint is that the Photoplasty will not let you see the final pic. Otherwise a fun app.
reviews.author: shaun o\'donnell

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I never get past the loading screen. Useless. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Sean Moore

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: I like this app, has some great articles and I don\'t have any problems with it except one; how come you need wifi? Like you guys aren\'t gonna change the articles in any way so why do you need wifi to see them?
reviews.author: Andrew Sedens

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Convenient little list of some of the best stuff from cracked. Nice little app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea, bad design
reviews.comment: Brilliant app, but about every five minutes or so it kicks back to the first article I\'ve read, even if I read five after it. So I have to go back and scroll down to the bottom of EACH ONE. Too frustrating to use. Deleting and relying on Cracked Reader Lite. This bug is a MAJOR problem
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app needs to be written again!!
reviews.comment: This is a quick and dirty app with an incredible amount of flaws. The \'designer\' needs to completely rethink programming strategies. The articles are brilliant, the app is really poor. Id sooner go direct to their website
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: It won\'t load so I can\'t read anything! All I can see is a loading screen when I open this app! Please help!  >_<
reviews.author: Ziyi Huang

reviews.title: Won\'t load
reviews.comment: Keep getting stuck at loading...no articles ever come out, the page just keeps loading for ever
reviews.author: Fu Jiahua

reviews.title: Oh, more good stuff!?
reviews.comment: This app makes going to a public restroom a neat experience!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: About 3 articles work
reviews.comment: The lite reader works fine for me this doesnt at all
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Questionable
reviews.comment: I like the articles, but why am I limited to online only for only a couple of articles. Download the other app instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: doesnt work
reviews.comment: cracked lite app uninstalled itself. went to reinstall it, downloaded best of versions 1 & 2. wifi is hooked up and neither of the \"best of\" apps will work and keep telling me im not connected to the internet. bummed.
reviews.author: leigha cardwell

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: Every time I try to open the app it just acts like it\'s loading, no matter how long I wait. :(
reviews.author: Nikki Corneliusen

reviews.title: Airplane use
reviews.comment: How do you pass a 6 hour fight with this app when it needs internet access to get it\'s articles?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: But after reading the articles I am now un installing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rilf8935
reviews.comment: This app itself, like said before is quite flawed.. Articles are great material to pass a couple minutes, and quite informative. Navigation on this app is horrible though.. Really needs to be updated..
reviews.author: A Google User
